Html:
Hi,

I am using the ASA style set. In-text citations are currently (Last name 1 and last name 2 year). Instead, I am looking for a way to modify the code so that it would be: Last name 1 and Last name 2 (year).

For example,

(Miller and Modigliani 2007) should become Miller and Modigliani (2007)

If you could please advise me on how to make this change, then I would really appreciate it.

Thank you so much!

EDIT: Nevermind, found a previous response of yours that addressed this issue. Thank you.
